Title: MediaElement Extensions
Description:
MediaElement Extensions makes it easier for Silverlight Developers to interact with MediaElement.
You will no longer have to handle media and user events...

Controls: ProgressSlider / VolumeSlider / Buttons (Play, Pause, Stop, FullScreen..)
Features: PlaylistManagement
HomeWiki:
MediaElement Extensions

Purpose

The purpose is to provide a .NET Library full of extensions for MediaElement - Initially focused on Silverlight
Controls which directly interact with their linked MediaElement (provided via DependencyProperty)
Features/Managers which provide extended features (such as Playlist Management)
StreamSources which could allow the MediaElement to play AVI files for example (media container management)

What is released yet

Nothing ! It is coming soon, I promise !

Need Help ?

Controls: Don't need help about development but if you have any request of Controls or something...
